original_text: When man began to multiply on the face of the land and daughters were born to them,
korean_text: 사람이 땅 위에 번성하기 시작할 때에 그들에게서 딸들이 나니

sentences.original_text: When man began to multiply on the face of the land
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들이 땅 위에 번성하기 시작했을 때에

sentences.original_text: and daughters were born to them,
